title: Does thePixel 5 bought in usa will work in india?does it get 1 physical sim + 1esim?
content:
I want to buy pixel 5 in usa and use it in india.Will it work with indian network currently it is 4g LTE, in future if india gets 5g enabled  does this mobile acquire 5g ?does this phone come with 1 physical sum + 1 esim?
How about the otg updates? and android updates?
